Hello world! Save
Hello blank fragment AnnouncementsList AllAnnouncementList DisplayAnnouncement Settings Refresh List Start Auto-Refresh Cancel Auto-Refresh Tech Announce Update There is a Tech Announcement update today!! No announcement today. Connection error. Set as Favorite Tech Announce Classifier App Confused?
Hi There, Thanks for Using Tech Announce Classifier Your daily announcement just became easier to read through

 How The Application Works To View Announcement in a Category - Click on a category or List to see group of announcements listed under it 

 To Save a Particular Category as Favorite - Long Press on the Category, a notification pops up that says \“The category has been Saved to Favorite\”.
 View selected category list in the Favorites Tab.

 To De-select a Favorites Category - Long Press on the Category while in the Favorites Tab, the notification appears on the screen.

 To View an Announcement in a category - click on the category, the announcements in this list appears 

 To Save an Announcement - Long press the announcement till a notification pops up on the screen
 View Saved Announcement list in the Saved-Pages Tab.

 To Remove Saved Announcement - Long Press on the announcement 
 while on the Saved-Pages Tab, the notification appears.
 MostRecentList
